fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e1.equipments.indoorgarden

Interface IndoorGardenCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, IndoorGardenImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndoorGardenConnector, IndoorGardenInboundPort, IndoorGardenOutboundPort

    public interface IndoorGardenCI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, IndoorGardenImplementationI
    The component interface IndoorGardenCI defines the services that an indoor garden component offers.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2022-09-16

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelPlanLight()
      cancel the current plan.
      void deactivate()
      deactivate the program, switching the light off if it was on when the call is made.
      java.time.Instant getCurrentTime()
      return the current local time.
      java.time.Instant getPlannedLightOff()
      return the time at which the light is switched off.
      java.time.Instant getPlannedLightOn()
      return the time at which the light is switched on.
      boolean isDeactivated()
      return true if the planned lighting is currently deactivated.
      boolean isLightOn()
      return true if the light should be currently on unless currently deactivated.
      boolean isLightPlanned()
      return true if the indoor garden has been planned.
      boolean isOn()
      return true if the indoor garden is on; otherwise false.
      void off()
      switch the indoor garden off.
      void on()
      switch the indoor garden on.
      void planLight(java.time.Instant timeOn, java.time.Instant timeOff)
      plan the time at which the light is switched on and switched off.
      void reactivate()
      deactivate the program, switching the light off if it was on when the call is made.
      void setCurrentTime(java.time.Instant current)
      set time to be taken as the time "now" when executing the component in simulated mode.
